title: Black Cat: A Sexy Romantic Comedy
features: One wicked witch, three wild women and some wine collide during the most powerful time of year for magic… What could possibly go wrong?

Lar has existed as a cat for a thousand years, with all the discomforts and indignities that go along with it. But when he is adopted by Belinda and gets a look into her life, can his curse finally be coming to an end?Look for more stories about the characters you meet in Black Cat in Just Desserts, Opposites Attract and Nice & Naughty by Cat Johnson.
